title: OpenOffice question
author: VD
content_html: Does anyone know how to get rid of tabs and line returns by using Find and Replace in OpenOffice Writer? It’s simple in Word, one simply uses ^t and ^p, but that doesn’t work in Writer.
content_text: Does anyone know how to get rid of tabs and line returns by using Find and Replace in OpenOffice Writer?  It’s simple in Word, one simply uses ^t and ^p, but that doesn’t work in Writer.
